website_summaries.verdict: The Skechers Delson - Brant grants a sleek look on a casual day to its wearers. It may look simple but this pair is a product of various, but complimenting materials from top to bottom. Even though there are few complaints when putting the shoes on, once successfully sliding the foot on, the comfort is unparalleled, allowing users to stand on it the entire day while still looking fashionable.
pros: Almost all of the Skechers Delson - Brant's buyers agree that it yields comfort that is in a league of its own
This eye-catching pair causes a large percentage of users to shower it with flattering remarks
Some of the most common words that the reviewers use to describe the design of the shoe are "attractive" and "excellent"
Most end users reveal their desire to buy another pair once the old ones wear out
A few mention that the Delson - Brant sneaker by Skechers allows the feet to breathe well
The Brant sneaker is lightweight with enough cushion, but still provides a good amount of support, according to several wearers
cons: Few are not that fond of the Skechers Delson - Brant's shoelace system since it is not adjustable, which makes it hard to put on
A number of users notice that the tongue slips down and that it is hard to pull back up

customer_reviews.title: Great comfy trainers
customer_reviews.text: Perfect with memory foam soles make these the lightest trainers I have ever owned. Well made and look great. Ordered my size 12 and they fit perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Mr Thomson

customer_reviews.title: They are very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: My husband loves these skechers so far, only had them a week are two, very comfortable. Only one thing about them he said they can be a bit difficult to get on in the mornings for work apart from that they are great
customer_reviews.author: pdb

customer_reviews.title: good looking with support to the ankle
customer_reviews.text: i personally found the fixed elasticated laces a bit tight, so i replaced them with ordinary laces. easy to do, i like the look of the shoes the comfort and the support
customer_reviews.author: J.C.Bramble

customer_reviews.title: Slip on and off easily.
customer_reviews.text: I like that they are slip on. I will wear them for a long haul flight where they can slip on and off easily.
customer_reviews.author: damsel

customer_reviews.title: Very Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: You can't beat Sketchers shoes, most comfortable shoes you can buy ,highly recommend these shoes ,very smart
customer_reviews.author: Bubble

customer_reviews.title: Comfy
customer_reviews.text: Very nice good allrounder for holiday nice enough with nice chinos for evenings
customer_reviews.author: Annette Mclarty

customer_reviews.title: Very comfy.
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable shoes that are light, flexible, but don't feel like trainers.
customer_reviews.author: m4plm

customer_reviews.title: Stunning
customer_reviews.text: Excellent shoes they look stunning and feel like a pair of slippers.
customer_reviews.author: Witters1

customer_reviews.title: The picture almost depicts a lace up shoe a bit misleading
customer_reviews.text: I have brought a lot of sketchers trainers but I should have read that this item is slip on not lace up but even so a very small opening
customer_reviews.author: KARA

customer_reviews.title: Delivered quickly
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable and well made am going to order another pair
customer_reviews.author: Cliff

customer_reviews.title: Go to trainers
customer_reviews.text: I use these trainers during the day and for going out at night. They are very comfortable and my girlfriend loves the way they look.
customer_reviews.author: Conor D.

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Great fit and I can stand on my fit for longer
customer_reviews.author: Rizhwan

customer_reviews.title: The fit
customer_reviews.text: Putting fit in was too little gap for a wide footed person. But once on very comfortable
customer_reviews.author: tt

customer_reviews.title: Nothing sketchy about these shoes
customer_reviews.text: Good looking shoe, good fit as usual with this supplier.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Nicholson

product_meta.title: Skechers Men's Delson-Brant Trainers
product_meta.description: Get right into the comfort and casual style of the Skechers delson - brant shoe. Smooth leather, mesh fabric and synthetic upper in a slip on laced-front sporty casual comfort sneaker oxford with stitching and overlay accents. Air cooled memory foam insole, flexible comfort midsole.
